name: Koichi Yoshimura
biography: Koichi Yoshimura (b.1939) is a second generation textile designer educated at Kobe University.  His company, S.Yoshimura, located in Fukui, an important textile manufacturing center in Japan, specializes in polyester and the combination of polyester with other yarns to create unusual effects.  Besides his own creations, he has worked with fashion designers Issey Miyake, Yohji Yamamoto and Donna Karan.
